casebody.data:
[Cite as 02/14/2003 Case Announcements #2, 2003-Ohio-688.]

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

February 14, 2003

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2003-0313. State v. Barnhouse.

Athens App. No. 02CA22, 2002-Ohio-7082. This cause is pending before the court on the certification of a conflict by the Court of Appeals for Athens County. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for immediate stay of execution of sentence,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for stay be, and hereby is, granted.

Resnick and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., dissent.
